FILE: cm630732v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAN - S. KOREA
RIVALRY: RIV120
DISPUTE(S): MID2555 MID2794 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180828
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181007

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2555

TERRMID: MID2555 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2555 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2555 from Gibler 2018, in 1985 Iran attacked a South Korean ship during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq as a means of harming Iraq's economy. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2555 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2555 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2555 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2555 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2555 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2555 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2555 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2794

TERRMID: MID2794 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2794 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2794 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iran attacked two South Korean ships during the Iran-Iraq War. Iran routinely attacked ships trading with Iraq as a means of harming Iraq's economy. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2794 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2794 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2794 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2794 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2794 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2794 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2794 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
